main event: A witness observed a brightly colored blue-white object traveling quickly across the sky near Middletown, Kentucky on January 19, 1967.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5 minutes., The object appeared to have a blue tail and seemed to burn out at the end of its path., The witness reported a bright light that was whiter and bluer than magnesium flare., The observation was made while the witness was traveling in a vehicle., The sighting was later concluded to be consistent with a meteor.
sighted object: bright blue-white object with a tail
